TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION:
DECODE(TRUE,
Substr(QUARTER_ID_v,5,2) = '01', concat(Substr(QUARTER_ID_v,0,4),'01'), Substr(QUARTER_ID_v,5,2) = '02', concat(Substr(QUARTER_ID_v,0,4),'01'), Substr(QUARTER_ID_v,5,2) = '03', concat(Substr(QUARTER_ID_v,0,4),'01'), Substr(QUARTER_ID_v,5,2) = '04', concat(Substr(QUARTER_ID_v,0,4),'02'), Substr(QUARTER_ID_v,5,2) = '05', concat(Substr(QUARTER_ID_v,0,4),'02'), Substr(QUARTER_ID_v,5,2) = '06', concat(Substr(QUARTER_ID_v,0,4),'02'), Substr(QUARTER_ID_v,5,2) = '07', concat(Substr(QUARTER_ID_v,0,4),'03'), Substr(QUARTER_ID_v,5,2) = '08', concat(Substr(QUARTER_ID_v,0,4),'03'), Substr(QUARTER_ID_v,5,2) = '09', concat(Substr(QUARTER_ID_v,0,4),'03'), Substr(QUARTER_ID_v,5,2) = '10', concat(Substr(QUARTER_ID_v,0,4),'04'), Substr(QUARTER_ID_v,5,2) = '11', concat(Substr(QUARTER_ID_v,0,4),'04'), Substr(QUARTER_ID_v,5,2) = '12', concat(Substr(QUARTER_ID_v,0,4),'04'),
'ERROR')

WORKFLOW.DESCRIPTION: These workflows are created from the Workflow Generation Wizard.
WORKFLOW.NAME: wf_CSS55_DATE_UPDATE

SESSION.DESCRIPTION: Update table CSS01LF03T with the latest Month_ID, CSS01LF07T with the latest Year_ID, CSS01LF04T with the latest Quarter_ID, using the Month_ID in CSS55AF01T.
SESSION.NAME: s_m_CSS55_DATE_UPDATE

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Fail task if any command fails
Fail task if any command fails

TASKINSTANCE.NAME: s_m_CSS55_DATE_UPDATE
